chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
L: Language

Goal:
forall (t : fol.Term L) (m : nat -> fol.Term L) (v n : nat), In n (freeVarTerm L t) -> In v (freeVarTerm L (m n)) -> In v (freeVarTerm L (subAllTerm t m))

Premises:
Inductive t : nat -> Set := F1 : forall n : nat, Fin.t (S n) | FS : forall n : nat, Fin.t n -> Fin.t (S n) Arguments Fin.t _%nat_scope Arguments Fin.F1 {n}%nat_scope Arguments Fin.FS {n}%nat_scope
freeVarTerm : forall L : Language, fol.Term L -> list nat
Module fol := Struct Record Language : Type := language { Relations : Set; Functions : Set; arity : Relations + Functions -> nat } Definition Relations : Language -> Set. Definition Functions : Language -> Set. Definition arity : forall l : Language, Relations l + Functions l -> nat. Inductive Term (L : Language) : Set := var : nat -> Term L | apply : forall f : Functions L, Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> Term L with Terms (L : Language) : nat -> Set := Tnil : Terms L 0 | Tcons : forall n : nat, Term L -> Terms L n -> Terms L (S n) Definition Term_rect : forall (L : Language) (P : Term L -> Type), (forall n : nat, P (var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : Terms L (arity L (inr f
subAllTerm = fix subAllTerm (t : fol.Term L) : (nat -> fol.Term L) -> fol.Term L := match t with | @fol.var _ x => fun m : nat -> fol.Term L => m x | @fol.apply _ f ts => fun m : nat -> fol.Term L => fol.apply L f (subAllTerms (arity L (inr f)) ts m) end with subAllTerms (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) {struct ts} : (nat -> fol.Term L) -> fol.Terms L n := match ts in (fol.Terms _ n0) return ((nat -> fol.Term L) -> fol.Terms L n0) with | @Tnil _ => fun _ : nat -> fol.Term L => Tnil L | @Tcons _ n' t ss => fun m : nat -> fol
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
freeVarSubAllTerm1 : forall (t : fol.Term L) (m : nat -> fol.Term L) (v : nat), In v (freeVarTerm L (subAllTerm t m)) -> exists n : nat, In n (freeVarTerm L t) /\ In v (freeVarTerm L (m n))
freeVarMap1 : forall (l : list nat) (m : nat -> fol.Term L) (v n : nat), In v (freeVarTerm L (m n)) -> In n l -> In v (freeVarMap l m)
freeVarSubAllTerms1 : forall (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) (m : nat -> fol.Term L) (v : nat), In v (freeVarTerms L n (subAllTerms n ts m)) -> exists a : nat, In a (freeVarTerms L n ts) /\ In v (freeVarTerm L (m a))
freeVarSubTerm4 : forall (L : Language) (t : fol.Term L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarTerm L (substituteTerm L t v s)) -> ~ In v (freeVarTerm L t) -> In x (freeVarTerm L t)
freeVarSubTerm2 : forall (L : Language) (t : fol.Term L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarTerm L s) -> In v (freeVarTerm L t) -> In x (freeVarTerm L (substituteTerm L t v s))
freeVarSubTerm1 : forall (L : Language) (t : fol.Term L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarTerm L t) -> v <> x -> In x (freeVarTerm L (substituteTerm L t v s))
freeVarSubTerm3 : forall (L : Language) (t : fol.Term L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarTerm L (substituteTerm L t v s)) -> In x (list_remove nat Nat.eq_dec v (freeVarTerm L t)) \/ In x (freeVarTerm L s)
subTermNil : forall (L : Language) (t : fol.Term L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), ~ In v (freeVarTerm L t) -> substituteTerm L t v s = t
freeVarSubTerms2 : forall (L : Language) (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarTerm L s) -> In v (freeVarTerms L n ts) -> In x (freeVarTerms L n (substituteTerms L n ts v s))
freeVarSubTerms3 : forall (L : Language) (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarTerms L n (substituteTerms L n ts v s)) -> In x (list_remove nat Nat.eq_dec v (freeVarTerms L n ts)) \/ In x (freeVarTerm L s)
subAllTerm_ext : forall (t : fol.Term L) (m1 m2 : nat -> fol.Term L), (forall m : nat, In m (freeVarTerm L t) -> m1 m = m2 m) -> subAllTerm t m1 = subAllTerm t m2
freeVarSubFormula2 : forall (L : Language) (f : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarTerm L s) -> In v (freeVarFormula L f) -> In x (freeVarFormula L (substituteFormula L f v s))
freeVarSubFormula3 : forall (L : Language) (f : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarFormula L (substituteFormula L f v s)) -> In x (list_remove nat Nat.eq_dec v (freeVarFormula L f)) \/ In x (freeVarTerm L s)
subTermExch : forall (L : Language) (t : fol.Term L) (v1 v2 : nat) (s1 s2 : fol.Term L), v1 <> v2 -> ~ In v2 (freeVarTerm L s1) -> ~ In v1 (freeVarTerm L s2) -> substituteTerm L (substituteTerm L t v1 s1) v2 s2 = substituteTerm L (substituteTerm L t v2 s2) v1 s1
subTermsExch : forall (L : Language) (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) (v1 v2 : nat) (s1 s2 : fol.Term L), v1 <> v2 -> ~ In v2 (freeVarTerm L s1) -> ~ In v1 (freeVarTerm L s2) -> substituteTerms L n (substituteTerms L n ts v1 s1) v2 s2 = substituteTerms L n (substituteTerms L n ts v2 s2) v1 s1
subTermTrans : forall (L : Language) (t : fol.Term L) (v1 v2 : nat) (s : fol.Term L), ~ In v2 (list_remove nat Nat.eq_dec v1 (freeVarTerm L t)) -> substituteTerm L (substituteTerm L t v1 (fol.var L v2)) v2 s = substituteTerm L t v1 s
freeVarSubTerms4 : forall (L : Language) (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarTerms L n (substituteTerms L n ts v s)) -> ~ In v (freeVarTerms L n ts) -> In x (freeVarTerms L n ts)
freeVarSubTerms1 : forall (L : Language) (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarTerms L n ts) -> v <> x -> In x (freeVarTerms L n (substituteTerms L n ts v s))
subSubTerm : forall (L : Language) (t : fol.Term L) (v1 v2 : nat) (s1 s2 : fol.Term L), v1 <> v2 -> ~ In v1 (freeVarTerm L s2) -> substituteTerm L (substituteTerm L t v1 s1) v2 s2 = substituteTerm L (substituteTerm L t v2 s2) v1 (substituteTerm L s1 v2 s2)
Term_Terms_ind : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Term L -> Prop) (P0 : forall n : nat, fol.Terms L n -> Prop), (forall n : nat, P (fol.var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P0 (arity L (inr f0)) t -> P (fol.apply L f0 t)) -> P0 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Term L), P t -> forall t0 : fol.Terms L n, P0 n t0 -> P0 (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall t : fol.Term L, P t
Term_Terms_rec_full : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Term L -> Set) (P0 : forall n : nat, fol.Terms L n -> Set), (forall n : nat, P (fol.var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P0 (arity L (inr f0)) t -> P (fol.apply L f0 t)) -> P0 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Term L), P t -> forall t0 : fol.Terms L n, P0 n t0 -> P0 (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall t : fol.Term L, P t
Terms_Term_ind : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Term L -> Prop) (P0 : forall n : nat, fol.Terms L n -> Prop), (forall n : nat, P (fol.var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P0 (arity L (inr f0)) t -> P (fol.apply L f0 t)) -> P0 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Term L), P t -> forall t0 : fol.Terms L n, P0 n t0 -> P0 (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Terms L n), P0 n t
Terms_Term_rec_full : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Term L -> Set) (P0 : forall n : nat, fol.Terms L n -> Set), (forall n : nat, P (fol.var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P0 (arity L (inr f0)) t -> P (fol.apply L f0 t)) -> P0 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Term L), P t -> forall t0 : fol.Terms L n, P0 n t0 -> P0 (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Terms L n), P0 n t
subFormulaNTE : forall (L : Language) (f : fol.Formula L) (T : fol.System L), (forall (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), ~ In v (freeVarFormula L f) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L (substituteFormula L f v s) f)) /\ (forall (v1 v2 : nat) (s : fol.Term L), ~ In v2 (list_remove nat Nat.eq_dec v1 (freeVarFormula L f)) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L (substituteFormula L (substituteFormula L f v1 (fol.var L v2)) v2 s) (substituteFormula L f v1 s))) /\ (forall (v1 v2 : nat) (s1 s2 : fol.Term L), v1 <> v2 -> ~ In v2 (freeVarTerm L s1) -> ~ In v1 (freeVarTerm...
subFormulaExch : forall (L : Language) (f : fol.Formula L) (T : fol.System L) (v1 v2 : nat) (s1 s2 : fol.Term L), v1 <> v2 -> ~ In v2 (freeVarTerm L s1) -> ~ In v1 (freeVarTerm L s2) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L (substituteFormula L (substituteFormula L f v1 s1) v2 s2) (substituteFormula L (substituteFormula L f v2 s2) v1 s1))
subAllFormula = fix subAllFormula (f : fol.Formula L) (m : nat -> fol.Term L) {struct f} : fol.Formula L := match f with | @fol.equal _ t s => fol.equal L (subAllTerm t m) (subAllTerm s m) | @fol.atomic _ r ts => fol.atomic L r (subAllTerms (arity L (inl r)) ts m) | @fol.impH _ f0 g => fol.impH L (subAllFormula f0 m) (subAllFormula g m) | @fol.notH _ f0 => fol.notH L (subAllFormula f0 m) | @fol.forallH _ n f0 => let nv := newVar (freeVarFormula L f0 ++ freeVarMap (freeVarFormula L (fol.forallH L n f0)) m) in fol.forallH L nv (subAllFormula f0 (fun v : nat => if Nat.eq_dec v...
freeVarSubFormula4 : forall (L : Language) (f : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarFormula L (substituteFormula L f v s)) -> ~ In v (freeVarFormula L f) -> In x (freeVarFormula L f)
Term_rect : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Term L -> Type), (forall n : nat, P (fol.var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P (fol.apply L f0 t)) -> forall t : fol.Term L, P t
Term_sind : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Term L -> SProp), (forall n : nat, P (fol.var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P (fol.apply L f0 t)) -> forall t : fol.Term L, P t
Term_rec : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Term L -> Set), (forall n : nat, P (fol.var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P (fol.apply L f0 t)) -> forall t : fol.Term L, P t

```coq
intros t m v n H1 H2.
unfold subAllTerm in H1.
remember (fix subAllTerm (t : fol.Term L) (m : nat -> fol.Term L) as f := 
match t with 
| @fol.var _ x => fun m0 : nat -> fol.Term L => m0 x 
| @fol.apply _ f0 ts => fun m0 : nat -> fol.Term L => fol.apply L f0 (subAllTerms (arity L (inr f0)) ts m0) 
end) as subAllTerm at 1.
rewrite HeqsubAllTerm in H1.
destruct t as [ | f0 ts ].
+ simpl in H1.
  apply freeVarTerm_map in H1.
  destruct H1 as [ x H1 ].
  apply freeVarTerm_map in H1.
  destruct H1 as [ y H1 ].
  apply freeVarTerm_map in H1.
  destruct H1 as [ z H1 ].
  apply freeVarTerm_map in H1.
  destruct H1 as [ w H1 ].
  apply freeVarTerm_map in H1.
  destruct H1 as [ H1 _ ].
  exists x.
  split.
  apply freeVarTerm_map.
  apply H1.
+ simpl in H1.
  apply freeVarTerm_map in H1.
  destruct H1 as [ x H1 ].
  apply freeVarTerm_map in H1.
  destruct H1 as [ y H1 ].
  apply freeVarTerm_map in H1.
  destruct H1 as [ z H1 ].
  apply freeVarTerm_map in H1.
  destruct H1 as [ w H1 ].
  apply freeVarTerm_map in H1.
  destruct H1 as [ H1 _ ].
  exists x.
  split.
  apply freeVarTerm_map.
  apply H1.
Qed.

original: intros t m v n H1 H2. unfold subAllTerm in H1.
